content: of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch m1 = make one with the right-hand needle point pick up the horizontal stitch that lies in-between two knitted stitches place this picked up stitch onto the tip of the left-hand needle and knit it to increase by one roo page 4 roo page 5 head neck beginning with the head back with yarn a cast on 4 sts return to the head side markers row 1 purl with the top of the head and the muzzle front towards you begin at roo s left row 2 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 6sts head side marker on your right with yarn a pick up and knit 4 sts evenly row 3 purl spaced along the row ends from the marker to the head back cast-on edge row 4 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 8sts from the beginning of the pattern pick up and knit 2 sts evenly across the cast- row 5 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 10sts on edge pick up and knit 4 sts along row ends to the right head side marker row 6 increase kfb k3 kfb twice k3 kfb - 14sts - 10sts row 7 purl pm place marker on the first and last stitch of the last row for right - ref fig 1 pick up and knit from a to b b to c c to d and left head side markers row 8 decrease k3 skpo k4 k2tog k3 to end of row - 12sts head back row 9 purl cast-on edge row 10 decrease k2 skpo k4 k2tog k2 to end of row - 10sts c b row 11-13 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch work short row to create front of the muzzle as follows short row 1 k9 w+tk wrap and turn knit see page 3 d a short row 2 p8 w+tp wrap and turn purl see page 3 short row 3 k7 w+tk short row 4 p6 w+tp short row 3 k5 w+tk short row 4 p4 w+tp muzzle front short row 5 decrease skpo k2tog k3 sts to end of row 8sts cast-off edge row 14 decrease p2tog four times - 4sts cast off all 4 muzzle front sts fig 1 roo page 6 roo page 7 row 1 purl short row 9 k8 w+tk row 2 kfb k2 skpo k2tog k2 kfb short row 10 p9 w+tp row 3 purl short row 11 k10 w+tk row 4 increase cast on 5 sts for left neck front k7 skpo k2 k2tog k2 to end of short row 12 p11 w+tp short row 13 k12 w+tk row 13sts short row 14 p13 w+tp row 5 increase cast on 5 sts for right neck front p18 to end of row short row 15 increase k15 kfb k2 kfb k16 to end of
